name: Barbados Cocktail
description: This rum cocktail is just a little boozy and just a little sweet, with fresh lime to keep it bright. Think of it as a little island escape.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces dark rum, such as Coruba
3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Fill mixing glass halfway full with crushed ice. Add falernum, rum, and lime juice. Shake for 15 seconds. Strain into cocktail glass and serve immediately.
